# Set Up

## Libr.
```{r}
library(stats)
library(tidyverse)
library(StatMatch)
library(xtable)
library(lmtest)
library(sandwich)
```

## Rm. Var.
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
dir = "/Users/simondn/Documents/Stats572/"
```

## Functions
```{r}
FileList = list.files(path =  paste0(dir,"data/EstimatedThetaPop"), 
                      pattern = "\\.csv$", 
                      full.names = TRUE)
FileList = lapply(FileList, read.csv)

ThetaPopList = matrix(nrow = length(FileList), ncol = 6)
for(i in 1:length(FileList)){
  ThetaPopList[i,] = FileList[[i]]$x
}

ThetaPopList = data.frame(ThetaPopList)
colnames(ThetaPopList) = c("delta","rho","N","gamma","K","BetaPop")
ThetaPopList = ThetaPopList %>% mutate(BetaPop = round(BetaPop,2)) 

saveRDS(ThetaPopList,paste0(dir,"/data/EstimatedThetaPop/EstimatedThetaPop.rds"))
```
